headline: How Leadership Changes and Tech Overhaul May Shape T. Rowe Price (TROW) Growth Prospects
summary: T. Rowe Price Group reported third quarter earnings showing increased revenue and net income, while also announcing the upcoming year-end departure of Chief Operating Officer Kimberly Johnson and the creation of a new Technology, Data, and Operations function led by Ramon Richards. This combination of improved financial performance and a refocused executive team highlights the firm's ongoing modernization efforts and commitment to integrating technology and operational excellence. We'll now...
